text: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.
author: Abigail Van Buren

text: Parenthood remains the greatest single preserve of the amateur.
author: Alvin Toffler

text: What good mothers and fathers instinctively feel like doing for their babies is usually best after all.
author: Benjamin Spock

text: Parenthood and family come first for me, and when I'm not working I'm cool with the Teletubbies.
author: Clive Owen

text: Success for me its to raise happy, healthy human beings.
author: Kelly LeBrock
